ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub', and from other sources.
Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub', and from other sources.

name: r-repmis
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-repmis
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/repmis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/repmis/repmis_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 371f8e08f61a2f71d0b1582f170535f8b92b1ea66c328ddb02b1bf984e283f1d

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r.cache
    - r-data.table
    - r-digest
    - r-httr
    - r-plyr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r.cache
    - r-data.table
    - r-digest
    - r-httr
    - r-plyr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('repmis')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('repmis')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://cran.r-project.org/package=repmis
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub', and from other sources.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: repmis
# Type: Package
# Title: Miscellaneous Tools for Reproducible Research
# Description: Tools to load 'R' packages and automatically generate BibTeX files citing them as well as load and cache plain-text and 'Excel' formatted data stored on 'GitHub', and from other sources.
# Version: 0.5
# Date: 2016-02-06
# Authors@R: c( person("Christopher", "Gandrud", email = "christopher.gandrud@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre")) )
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# URL: http://cran.r-project.org/package=repmis
# BugReports: https://github.com/christophergandrud/repmis/issues
# Imports: data.table, digest, httr, plyr, R.cache
# Suggests: xlsx
# RoxygenNote: 5.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-02-06 19:46:42 UTC; christophergandrud
# Author: Christopher Gandrud [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Christopher Gandrud <christopher.gandrud@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-02-07 09:16:30
